DOC.brief_summary: conduct longitudinal 4-year clinical trial determine long-term effect soy consumption lipid profile , renal-function index CRP level among type 2 diabetic patient nephropathy .
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Effect Soy Consumption Cardio-Renal Indices CRP Type 2diabetes With Nephropathy
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Several short-term trial effect soy consumption cardiovascular risk available , little evidence exists regard impact long-term soy protein consumption among type 2 diabetic patient nephropathy . Objectives : To determine effect long-term soy consumption cardiovascular risk , C-reactive protein kidney-function index among type 2 diabetic patient nephropathy . Design : This longitudinal randomized clinical trial conduct among 41 type 2 diabetic patient nephropathy ( 18 men 23 woman ) . Twenty patient soy protein group consume diet contain 0.8 g protein/kg body weight ( 35 % animal protein , 35 % textured soy protein , 30 % vegetable protein ) 21 patient control group consume similar diet contain 70 % animal proteins 30 % vegetable proteins 4-years .
